_header: Father and Son and Holy Ghost / To Thee I cry and call most
Note: Lines 25403-86 in some MSS of Cursor Mundi (3474).
Subjects: Trinity, prayers to; prayers, to Trinity
_description: A prayer to the Trinity — seven 12-line stanzas

BodFair14.First Lines:
Fader & sone & haligasteto þe I cry & calle
                    masteþat trewest art in trone…
BodFair14.Last Lines:
…lorde fader louid in trinitefader sone &
                    haligaste

BLCottVesAIII.First Lines:
ffader and sun and haligastTo þe i cri and call
                    mast…
BLCottVesAIII.Last Lines:
…Lauerd loued in triniteffader and sune and
                    haligast

fAdir and sune and hali gastTo þe i cri and call
